dcterms:creator: R. J. Williams
dcterms:description: REINFORCE is a reinforcement learning algorithm that updates the parameters of a stochastic neural network based on the received rewards, allowing for local updates that do not require knowledge of the gradient of the reward function.
dcterms:title: REINFORCE

dcterms:creator: G. E. Hinton
P. Dayan
R. M. Neal
R. S. Zemel
dcterms:description: The Wake-Sleep algorithm is a method for unsupervised learning in neural networks that alternates between a 'wake' phase, where the model learns to reconstruct inputs, and a 'sleep' phase, where it generates samples from the learned distribution.
dcterms:title: Wake-Sleep algorithm
